titles.title: Panama Canal Commission Fair Claims Act
A bill to amend the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to require the payment of interest on certain damages awarded by the Panama Canal Commission.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4465)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 4/19/1994--Introduced. Amends the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to require the payment of interest on damages awarded by the Panama Canal Commission due to the negligence of U.S. employees in connection with the passage of vessels through the Panama Canal.
